column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Nothing about the meal was disappointing. The steaks were perfect even though they had to hold up through a short drive. I've been to other steakhouses in the area that boasted amazing steaks
column2: but fell short. The petite filet mignon literally melted in my mouth
column3: and the sauce that accompanied it was a great touch. The sides were perfectly seasoned
column4: and I was happy that the Brussels sprouts hit the mark whereas most places tend to over-sauce them.
